biography_text: FLETCHER, Elizabeth, a Representative from Texas; born in Houston, Harris County, Tex., February 13, 1975; graduated from St. Johnâs School, Houston, Tex., 1993; B.A., Kenyon College, Gambier, Ohio; 1997; J.D., College of William & Mary, Williamsburg, Va., 2006; lawyer; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: College of William & Mary, Williamsburg, Va.
